IP_SYN_2_var_1:
Indication: RML nodule.
Procedure: Bronchoscopy, TBNA, EBUS, Forceps Bx.
Findings: Vascular tumor RML lateral segment.
Intervention: TBNA of nodule (6 passes). Bleeding controlled w/ TXA. EBUS of 4L, 7, 4R, 11R (all neg). Forceps bx of RML tumor (5 samples).
Complications: Moderate bleeding, required tamponade.
Plan: PACU.
